00033 // Calculate node sizes which are most suitable for one fs block
00034 #include "EfsNameKey.h"
00035 
00036 const int EfsFitsElemSize = sizeof( BTreeElement< EfsNameKey, int > );
00037 const int EfsFitsNodeC = sizeof( BTreeNode< 1, EfsNameKey, int > ) - EfsFitsElemSize;
00038 const int EfsTreeNameNodeSize = ( EfsDefaultBlockSize - EfsFitsNodeC )/EfsFitsElemSize;
00039 
00040 const int EfsFreesElemSize = sizeof( BTreeElement< int, int > );
00041 const int EfsFreesNodeC = sizeof( BTreeNode< 1, int, int > ) - EfsFreesElemSize;
00042 const int EfsTreePtrNodeSize = ( EfsDefaultBlockSize - EfsFreesNodeC )/EfsFreesElemSize;

00054 // File information structure
00055 #pragma pack( 1 )
00056 struct EfsFileInfo
00057 {
00058         char fileName[ EfsDefaultMaxFilenameSize ];
00059         int attributes; // ReadOnly, Hidden, Encripted and so on.
00060         gint64 fileSize;
00061         int crc;
00062         char encryption[ 56 ];
00063         int creationTime;
00064         int lastChangeTime;
00065         int lastAccessTime;
00066 };
00067 #pragma pack()
00068 
00069 // FIT service information structure
00070 #pragma pack( 1 )
00071 struct EfsFITServiceInfo
00072 {
00073         int addr;
00074         int fitSize;
00075         int fragmentsCount;
00076         int allBlocks;
00077         int liberalSize;
00078         int reserved1;
00079         int reserved2;
00080         int reserved3;
00081 };
00082 #pragma pack()
00083 
00084 const int EfsFISize = sizeof( EfsFileInfo );
00085 const int EfsFITServiceSize = sizeof( EfsFITServiceInfo );

00115 // Space fragment, with start block addr (in blocks space)
00116 // and count of blocks in fragment
00117 #pragma pack( 1 )
00118 struct EfsFragment
00119 {
00120         EfsFragment() : addr( 0 ), count( 0 ) {}
00121 
00122         int addr;
00123         int count;
00124 };
00125 #pragma pack()
00126 
00127 const int EfsFragmentSize = sizeof( EfsFragment );

00129 const int EfsSignatureSize = 8;
00130 const char EfsSignature[ EfsSignatureSize ] = 
00131 {
00132         ( char ) 0x77, ( char ) 0x77, ( char ) 0x77, ( char ) 0x88, 
00133         ( char ) 0x88, ( char ) 0x88, ( char ) 0x66, ( char ) 0xFD 
00134 };

00136 // Efs service block structure (which puts in 0 addr)
00137 #pragma pack( 1 )
00138 struct EfsServiceBlock
00139 {
00140         char signature[ EfsSignatureSize ];
00141         int version;
00142         int mountedState; // By now: 1 - mounted, 0 - unmounted successfully
00143         int freesRootAddr;
00144         int fitsRootAddr;
00145 };
00146 #pragma pack()
00147 
00148 // Represents handle of an open file
00149 struct EfsHandle
00150 {
00151         int access;
00152         gint64 offsetPtr;
00153         int fileBlockAddr;
00154 };
00155 
00156 // Overhead information structure with all necessary data
00157 // for mounting and using Adaptive File System
00158 #pragma pack( 1 )
00159 struct EfsOverhead
00160 {
00161         gint64 blockSize;
00162         gint64 growthFactor;
00163         int minFreeBlockCount;  // Minimal amount of blocks for space growth
00164         int defaultFileBuffer;  // Size of the liberal file space
00165         EfsAllocMethod allocationMethod;
00166 };
00167 #pragma pack()
00168 
00169 const int EfsServiceBlockSize = sizeof( EfsServiceBlock );
00170 const int EfsOverheadSize = sizeof( EfsOverhead );
00171 
00172 const int EfsFreesRootOffset = EfsSignatureSize + sizeof( int )*2;
00173 const int EfsFitsRootOffset = EfsFreesRootOffset + sizeof( int );

00175 // Struct which contains all information about file system
00176 struct EfsInfoStruct
00177 {
00178         gint64 size;
00179         gint64 freeSpace;
00180         float freeQuotient;
00181         EfsOverhead overheadInfo;
00182 };
